item.description:
Join Us at the CTGolfTips.com Scramble Saturday September 20, 2008 at 3pm

Play 9 Holes of Golf with CTGolfTips.com

Join CTGolfTips.com and Certified Teaching Professional George Claffey for playing lessons on the Golf Course & 9 holes of Golf at Miner Hills

Have a great time & improve your game at the CTGolfTips.com Scramble

Then join us for food, drinks, music, awards, and prizes.

SPACE IS LIMITED!

Tickets are only $60 Online, - add a golf cart for $10 more


Get Your Ticket Today at www.CTGolfTips.com or call (860) 436-9449

All clubs, equipment, driving range fees, golf course fees, and golf balls are included, -or bring your own clubs.



Sat Sept 20 2008
Start Time 3pm


Miner Hill Golf Course
85 Miner Hills Drive
Middletown CT 06457
Take 91 to Exit 20 (Country Club Road) 1 mile from highway
www.CTGolfTips.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the white www.CTGolfTips.com hats

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: SOLD OUT Join Us at the CTGolfTips.com Scramble Saturday September 20 at 3pm
